column1: Marmadoc "Masterful" Brandybuck was a Hobbits of the Shire.
Marmadoc was the son of Madoc Brandybuck and Hanna Goldworthy. He married Adaldrida Bolger and had four children; two sons
Marmadoc is an actual Celtic name
column2: a variation of Marmaduke. It derives from  Máel Máedóc
column6: 2010 It is possible this is a reference to his father Madoc Brandybuck.
